name: Flesh Eating Jelly Cube
description:
"The dungeon is under attack by outsiders, go my carnivorous pet, consume them, protect your master."

Instructions

Move with the arrow keys to move the cube (if this shifts the page, try in fullscreen)

R to restart the game

Made for Untitled Game Jam - Theme: Dungeon

Prototype game where you navigate a pixel dungeon as a cube of flesh eating ooze to kill the intruders. 11 levels and a handful of enemy types. I may consider developing this more into a full game with more levels, more enemy types, and a stronger focus on puzzle solving.
